author: Louise Hall, Louise Hall
title: 'I deal with gunshots every day. This is the only thing that scares me': Doctor gives coronavirus interview live from emergency room
description: 'I want people to stay home, this is the real deal'
content:
A Chicago doctor has described life as a medical professional on the front line of the coronavirus outbreak.
Dr Scott Samlan, who works at the Mount SinaiHospital on Chicagos west side, spoke to CBS News David Begnaud from the heart of the crisis, giving the… [+3255 chars]
